title: Miscellaneous Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott, Bart
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Mary was manned during herfather's lifetime to Mr. Ditcher, a respectable surgeon at Bath. Martha, who had been his principalamanuensis, became, after his decease, the wife ofEdward Bridgen, Esq.; and Sarah married Mr.Crowther, surgeon, in Boswell's Court. Anne, awoman of a most amiable disposition, but whoseweak health had often alarmed the affections of herparents, survived, nevertheless, her sisters, as wellas her parents.
